results.name: Just Another VS. MATT Mod | Jonnycat Port's [Mac]

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support OpenGL 2.1 or higher. Intel HD 3000 or better.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ANY
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support OpenGL 2.1 or higher. Intel HD 3000 or better.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ANY
